      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold​(int t)
        You play with fire! This allows the slider to change not increase the activity integrate sleep period, but also to decrease the integrator timestep. This will almost certainly mess up data collection (averages, etc. need to be reset when moving the slider whenever the slider changes the timestep).
        Parameters:
        t - The maximum sleep period that will actually be invoked. If the desired sleep period is greater than t, then the sleep period will be equal to t and the integrator timestep will be lowered so that the amount slept per simulation time is as desired.

      • graphic

        public javax.swing.JPanel graphic​()
